data_usage: The map displays the difference between the average total annual precipitation across the contiguous U.S. for the period 1991-2012, minus that for the period 1901-1960.
methodology: At each grid point across the contiguous U.S., the annual total precipitation amount was averaged for the period 1901-1960. A second average precipitation amount was calculated for the period 1991-2012. At each gridpoint, the difference between the 1991-2012 precipitation and the 1901-1960 precipitation was calculated as a percentage change.
